head.supplied: QUARTERLY ESTIMATE ¶ . ¶ To the Honorable ¶ ¶ the Chief Secretary ¶ Sir ¶ , ¶ ¶ I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate of Expenditure during the ¶ ¶ 2 months ¶ ¶ ending ¶ ...

div.p: K76/8096, unit 880, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

note.p: MS written by G. Luehmann for M, who generally signs these requisitions.

div.p: To the Honorable the Chief Secretary
I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate of Expenditure during the 2 months ending 31st August 1876.

cell.p:
100
100 deleted by W. Odgers, Under Secretary. The column has been ticked.

cell.p:
Total — Two hundred and sixty eight pounds six shillings and eight pence
See next note.
